snippet.title: DEATH NOTE Killer Within – How to Play Trailer
snippet.description:
How do you find Kira (or place the blame on someone else)? Learn how to play DEATH NOTE Killer Within! Game is available now on Playstation and PC (with crossplay!) #DeathNoteKillerWithin

Follow Bandai Namco Entertainment: 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bandainamcous
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BandaiNamcoUS
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BandaiNamcoUS
Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/bandainamcous
